full_text:
Mohammed Mirzan
Computer Engineering Undergraduate
Kandy Sri Lanka | Github | Email | 0319-363-5515 | LinkedIn
Aspiring data analyst and data Engineer with hands-on experience in self-driven data projects, including data
visualization, analysis, and machine learning. Eager to apply my skills in SQL, Power BI, Python, and data-driven
problem solving to contribute to impactful business decisions and continuous improvement in a dynamic
organization.
Education
University of Engineering and Technology, Taxila | Bachelor’s Degree Taxila,Pakistan | 8.2022 - Current
Cumulative GPA – 3.66
Currently pursuing a BSc in Computer Engineering with a focus on core subjects such as Digital Signal
Processing, Algorithms, and Database Management Systems. Co-Head of the Machine Learning Team at the
Taxilians Robotics and Automation Club, where I have gained hands-on experience in machine learning projects.
Work experience
Oasis Infobyte | Data Scientist Intern Remote, India | 08.2024 – 09.2024
• Iris Flower Classification: Applied machine learning models like Logistic Regression and KNN to
classify iris flower species.
• Car Price Prediction: Used Linear Regression, Random Forest, and Gradient Boost Regressor to predict
car prices, with Linear Regression achieving the best performance.
• Unemployment Rate Analysis: Analyzed unemployment data to uncover trends and insights, applying
various machine learning models.
Projects
• Flask Backend for CRUD Web Application
Built a Flask-based backend for a CRUD application, enabling create, read, update, and delete operations
on user data stored in a MySQL database. Integrated Flask-MySQLdb for secure database interactions and
implemented routes for user management with flash messages for feedback. Designed a responsive
frontend with HTML and CSS.
• Sales Performance Dashboard
Developed a Power BI dashboard using the "Awesome Chocolates" dataset to analyze sales performance,
target achievements, and salesperson efficiency. Visualized actual vs. target sales, monthly performance
trends, and brand-wise contributions. Provided actionable insights to optimize strategies and improve sales
outcomes.
• Hospitality Domain Dashboard
Analyzed data for Atliq Grands using Power BI, focusing on KPIs like RevPAR, ADR, and occupancy
rate. The insights revealed revenue trends and booking platform performance. Actionable
recommendations were made for improving property performance and managing cancellations.
• Pizza Sales Analysis
Analyzed a pizza sales dataset using SQL for data querying and Power BI for visualization. Key insights,
such as top-selling pizzas and customer preferences, were uncovered. These findings helped formulate
actionable recommendations for optimizing inventory and marketing strategies.
• Data Analytics Challenges
Participated in Power BI challenges organized by Onyx Data, Codebasics, and FP20 Analytics, working
on projects like Healthcare Analysis, OTT Merger Analysis, Merchandise Sales Analysis, and Population
Analysis. Created interactive dashboards for each project, gaining hands-on experience in data
visualization, insights generation, and business reporting using Power BI.
Skills and Certifications
• Languages: Python, SQL, MATLAB, C++
• Tools: Python-Flask, Pandas, Matplotlib, Numpy, Seaborn, scikit-learn, Power BI, Tableau, Microsoft
Excel, Jupyter Notebook, PyCharm, DAX, MySQL
• Certifications: Machine Learning Specialization by DeepLearning.AI, Microsoft PL-300 Exam
Preparation and Practice, Introduction to Data Engineering by DeepLearning.AI
Memberships
• AI Research and Development – Data Science Head
• Taxilians Robotics and Automation Club – Machine Learning Co head
• Media Club of University of Engineering and Technology, Taxila – Member
• Aspire Leaders Alumni
Interest and Hobbies
• Reading Books
• Playing Badminton
• Teaching Mathematics
